resources.string: About Pocket Pet: Pocket Pet, inspired by Studio Ghibli and Tamagotchi, is your virtual pet companion. Hatch your pet, love it, feed it, and care for it.

Caring for Your Pet: Love, Feed, clean, and play with ease using dedicated buttons. Icons make it simpleâ€”the love button has a heart, the food button has food on it, the cleaning button has a broom on it, and the play button has a controller on it.
Monitor Your Pet: Keep an eye on your pet\'s hunger and happiness percentage. If the pet\'s hunger or happiness percentage reaches 0% the pet will die.
Fresh Start: If your pet\'s journey ends, we\'ll provide a new egg to begin anew.
Your pet has died, but a new egg has spawned!
